rules_text:
Emerge {6}{G} [i](You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)[/i]
When Wish for Eternity enters, you gain 7 life.
flavor_text:
[i]“I didn't know her for long, but she was so scared of death. She's not scared anymore, at least.”
—Dhere, lone wanderer[/i]
